comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I have a lunch date tomorrow and a few pernicious, ill-timed appointments today, but this weather is my _raison d'Ãªtre_. Being a former [Soggy Bottom Boy](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OF5OtSO3j6I), I wouldn't miss it. I'll try to get out today at 1PM for a little humid Flagstaffing. Bottoms up, DU
